body_html: @jsainio Thanks for investigating this! That's weird, workers should only exit together, and once the main process is done reading the data. Can you try to inspect why do they exit prematurely? Maybe check the kernel log (dmesg)?
body_text: @jsainio Thanks for investigating this! That's weird, workers should only exit together, and once the main process is done reading the data. Can you try to inspect why do they exit prematurely? Maybe check the kernel log (dmesg)?
body: @jsainio Thanks for investigating this! That's weird, workers should only exit together, and once the main process is done reading the data. Can you try to inspect why do they exit prematurely? Maybe check the kernel log (`dmesg`)?
